word: \n     In the prayer which Christ taught his disciples, he said: \"Forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.\" By this he did not mean us to understand that in order to be forgiven, we are not to require our just dues from our debtors; but if through unwise management they have been placed where they can not pay, they are not to be treated harshly, oppressed, nor placed in prison.
